## Task 3


Qualitative Variables: River, Species

Quantitative variables: Mile, Length, Weight

There are 3 Species in ddt data set

```{R}

names(ddt)

class(ddt)

summary(ddt)

with(ddt,ddt[order(SPECIES,WEIGHT),])

with(ddt, ddt[WEIGHT>800 & SPECIES=="LMBASS",])


with(ddt, ddt[RIVER=="SCM" & DDT>4.0,])

```

## Task 9


BOXPLOT
```{R}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(ddt, aes(x = SPECIES, y = WEIGHT, fill = RIVER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  ggtitle("Morris Chi") +
  xlab("Species") +
  ylab("Weight") +
  theme_minimal()
```

VIOLIN PLOT
```{R}
ggplot(ddt, aes(x = RIVER, y = LENGTH, fill = SPECIES)) +
  geom_violin() +
  ggtitle("Morris Chi") +
  xlab("River") +
  ylab("Length") +
  theme_minimal()
```

SCATTERPLOT
```{R}
ggplot(ddt, aes(x = WEIGHT, y = LENGTH, color = SPECIES)) +
  geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.7) + 
  ggtitle("Morris Chi") +
  xlab("Weight") +
  ylab("Length") +
  theme_minimal()

```
